S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-6383(Update trigger defined on one column fires on update of other columns)
backporting part of the junit tests added for DERBY-6383. Had to comment out couple drop column related tests because of DERBY-6417(Dropping a column in 10.7 release when there is a trigger with REFERENCING OLD clause defined on the table gives error "ERROR 42X05: Table/View 'OLD' does not exist.".) in 10.7 codeline
